div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 192 Aliveri environs, Euboea, after 1930 Burial: 235-200 B.C. Contents: 18 AR Euboea: 1 tetradr. (c. 395 B.C.) Carystus: 11 didr. (cow/cock) 3 didr. (royal head) 2 dr. (Herakles/cow) 1 triob. (Herakles/palm tree) Disposition: dispersed Wallace, Essays Robinson, pp. 205-6
